Name: Laser sight
Descriptions:
+2 Bullets
+10% Damage For Bullets
You get a red laser sight to improve your aim

Name: Auto loader
Descriptions: You particularly reload every couple seconds

Name: Fat laser
Descriptions: Get a short but wide laser using right click

Name: Organic brand bullets
Descriptions: Gain a bullet each time you crit; get more crit the closer they are

Name: Extra strength gun powder
Descriptions: Crits make an explosive on hit

Name: Under barrel rocket launcher
Descriptions: You shoot rockets which explode on hit

Name: Laser boots
Descriptions: You shoot a small laser with right click; When you dash shoot a laser behind you

Name: Mida's touch
Descriptions: Killing enemies have a chance to give gold

Name: Golden bullet
Descriptions: Your first bullet after a reold is fat and does damage based on your gold

Name: Bouncing blade
Descriptions: Shoot a blade that bounces up to 5 times; Return when toucching you or degrading
